bug.author: TimZaman
bug.summary: Wrong Caffe version parsed for OS-X
bug.description: See title. I bet there's a reason for this line that hardcodes the caffe version for mac to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/DIGITS/blob/master/digits/config/caffe_option.py#L158>https://github.com/NVIDIA/DIGITS/blob/master/digits/config/caffe_option.py#L158</denchmark-link> . I just removed L157-L159 and everything seems fine: <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7721540/16893350/e7759f64-4ae9-11e6-9ed7-6dc04fa532a8.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TimZaman>@TimZaman</denchmark-link> , thanks for pointing that out. I might forget to remove that, or maybe I keep it for other reason. Let me find out.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/TimZaman>@TimZaman</denchmark-link> , can you help check what happens if your Caffe in Darwin does not have version info? We would like DIGITS to tell users to upgrade their Caffe when no version info is available. Thanks.

Yes give me an hour On Monday, 18 July 2016, Isaac Yang <denchmark-link:mailto:notifications@github.com>notifications@github.com</denchmark-link> wrote:
@TimZaman https://github.com/TimZaman , can you help check what happens if your Caffe in Darwin does not have version info? We would like DIGITS to tell users to upgrade their Caffe when no version info is available. Thanks. â€” You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub #914 (comment), or mute the thread https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AHXSRG8QnL-BebsRnScdfTGLnZOPnZ84ks5qW6kmgaJpZM4JN8xX .
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/IsaacYangSLA>@IsaacYangSLA</denchmark-link> I made a mini PR for this Mac issue, since you said you're a BSD man.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/TimZaman>@TimZaman</denchmark-link> , thanks. I will comment on the PR.
